title: What are five analytic principles used in the science of consequences, and how? - Quora

response.answer_text: Consequentialism: Behaviors have effects and results. Evolutionary Advantage: Some behaviors have perceived-beneficial consequences like inventions or smart children. Natural History: Species and their environment change over time. Dynamics: Facts and behaviors may change due to interactions or internal processes. Winning and Losing: Some species win more than others, some may die out.
